QuestData.Title: Libram of Tenacity
QuestData.CompletionText: Thirty gold, $R. Thirty gold and the required components.
QuestData.RewardText: It took Kariel what would amount to several of your lifetimes to complete the libram that you now hold, $R. All for what? So that his disciple could stand in the Burning Steppes and bastardize his research in order to satiate a never ending arcane craving... Curse this foul addiction.$B$BI am disgusted with your lack of compassion and insatiable greed. Be gone!
